thread.title: Kannan's next is a village-based cop story
thread.title_full: Kannan's next is a village-based cop story - The Times of India

author: Mrinalini Sundar
title: Kannan's next is a village-based cop story
text:
Director Kannan, who directed Naan Than Bala starring Vivekh is ready with his next film, Soodhu Vaadhu. The movie has actors Santhosh and Jegan playing the leads. Kannan says, "It is a village-based subject and the story revolves around two brothers â€” one is a cop and the other is a police jeep driver."
He adds, "Subbulakshmi, who makes her debut in this film, is the female lead. Popular actors like Kovai Sarala and Motta Rajendran are also a part of the cast. We have shot extensively in Kutralam and Tirunelveli."
